songs.title: Ridin’ In A Coupe
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Edai]
I say, I’m riding in a coupe…
My niggas ‘bout to shoot…

[Hook: Edai]
I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And what we smoking came from LA
I met a little bitch in LA
And we gangbang like it’s LA
I got on all this Ferragamo
And all these bitches want us
I say, I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And we gangbang like it’s LA

[Verse 1: Edai]
I say, bitch don’t run up on L’A
I’ll up a chopper
Got you pussies bailing
I’m smoking dope
I know you smell it
600 do a lot of killing
I swear them opp boys want to be just like us
They jacking style, them niggas stealing
I’m stacking money to the ceiling
Got a 30 and you can feel it
And all these bitches like us
I got all these bitches diking
I’m getting all these fucking commas
Got on this Ferragamo
Please don’t run up on us

[Hook: Edai]
I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And what we smoking came from LA
I met a little bitch in LA
And we gangbang like it’s LA
I got on all this Ferragamo
And all these bitches want us
I say, I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And we gangbang like it’s LA

[Verse 2: L’A Capone]
You probably heard of me, I’m L’A
And all the fuck I know is get cake
I got a whole lot of food on my plate
I man down him then shoot out of state
And every day I step out, I be so fleek
If you ain’t know, I’m L’A baby!
We turn up sucka
We go crazy
Turn on your television
Watch us HD
I’m getting all these fucking commas
We wearing Gucci, Louis, Prada
She unbuckles Ferragamo
Then bitch, I’m splurging!

[Hook: Edai]
I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And what we smoking came from LA
I met a little bitch in LA
And we gangbang like it’s LA
I got on all this Ferragamo
And all these bitches want us
I say, I’m riding in a coupe with L’A
And we gangbang like it’s LA
